import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import Popup from "reactjs-popup"; export const Expense = ({transaction}) => { const onDelete = event => { axios.delete(`api/${transaction.id}/`); } const onUpdate = event => { const name = event.target.name.value; const amount = event.target.amount.value; const username = localStorage.getItem("username"); return axios.put(`api/${transaction.id}/`, {name: name, username: username, amount: amount}) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
{transaction.amount < 0 &&
  • {transaction.name} : ${Math.abs(transaction.amount)}
    Update} modal closeOnDocumentClick>
